jd: From: Sumit kumar, Tanisha systems Inc sumit@tanishasystems.com Reply to: sumit@tanishasystems.com Pega Developer Plano, TX/Columbus OH A Pega Developer is responsible for designing, developing, and implementing Pega Platform-based applications. They work closely with business analysts, architects, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver solutions that meet business objectives.Key Responsibilities:Requirements Gathering: Collaborating with business analysts to understand and document business requirements.Design and Development: Designing and developing Pega applications using the Pega Platform's low-code development environment.Process Modeling: Modeling business processes using Pega's case management capabilities.Integration: Integrating Pega applications with other systems and applications.Testing: Developing and executing test cases to ensure application quality.Deployment: Deploying Pega applications to production environments.Maintenance: Providing ongoing support and maintenance for Pega applications.Required Skills:Pega Platform: Strong understanding of Pega Platform concepts, features, and best practices.Java: Proficiency in Java programming language.Case Management: Knowledge of case management concepts and best practices.Business Analysis: Ability to understand and analyze business requirements.Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.Communication: Excellent communication skills to collaborate with team members and stakeholders.
